item.title: SQL in RMarkdown!
item.description: This semester Iâ€™m teaching Applied Databases for the first time and have been struggling with some notes and handouts for students; as well as simple, easy to use database interfaces that work well across platforms. I love RMarkdown, and today realized that knitr has an SQL code engine! Basic Syntax I often give handouts on SQL statements as we learn about them, so I need a nice way to show commands.
